letters.description: Establish a safe and trusting therapeutic alliance with the client and animal partner; assess suitability and readiness for AAT coaching.
Conduct a thorough assessment of the client's needs, goals, and strengths; foster self-awareness through animal-assisted activities.
Implement targeted interventions using the animal partner to facilitate emotional regulation, skill-building, and behavioral change.
Help the client integrate newly learned skills and coping strategies into their daily life, using the animal as a consistent source of support.
Develop a long-term plan for maintaining progress and preventing relapse, empowering the client to continue benefiting from their connection with animals.
